name: Righteous Kill 2: Revenge of the Poet Killer
name_original: Righteous Kill 2: Revenge of the Poet Killer
description:
Righteous Kill 2: Revenge of the Poet Killer is a game developed by Media Art. It came out on 26-05-2009. Merscom published the game.
Righteous Kill 2: Revenge of the Poet Killer is available on PC.
